ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] grouping thread on the Everquest boards
ygData.msgSnippet: ... It has happened to me in Firiona Vie, but yes it was after 32. I don t mean to gainsaying all your points, but I just keep grouping with tanks who freely
ygData.messageBody:
> When was the last time you entered a zone to see shouts of
> "Bard wanted for
> group"?

It has happened to me in Firiona Vie, but yes it was after 32. I don't mean
to gainsaying all your points, but I just keep grouping with tanks who
freely offer "ahhh, I love bards" after the first battle. I have a tank (not
in my guild) who sends me a tell every single time he is setting up a group,
he sees a bard as invaluable glue. I have had casters who when I shout
"bard looking for fort group" shout "No your not, you are with us. Dibs on
the bard" (yeah I had grouped once with them before, and yes that was at
32). I just have had great luck with being invited in and kept in a group.
32 changes a LOT, but not everything. The trick is education *laughs*
letting the group know what you can do. If a pickup group I am in is looking
a bit of downtime I always mem guardian/purifying rhythms and, playing the
drum, say "Check out your resists". It ALWAYS gets amazed groupsays with
lots of caps and exclamations. And suggestions we go fight Cenobites
*laughs*

Tszaaz


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
